name: Field Brawl
description:
Field-Brawl

A small turn based strategy Prototype.

You take turns playing for both sides

  • Left-click to select Units
  • Right-click to see Stats
  • Space to change Turns
  • Goal is to kill the enemy Leader
  • Units can move and attack once each turn
  • Houses generate 10 Gold each turn
  • You can buy extra Units for Gold in the Barracks (the Button on each side)
  • The Archer and Javelineer dont get hit by Defense Damage, because they are ranged Units

The game was made alongside the "The Ultimate Guide to making a 2D strategy game in Unity" Course by Noa Calice (aka Blackthornprod). I expanded and changed the base Code from the Course

I made all Visuals myself, used modified sounds from https://freesound.org/ and the background music is Teller of the Tales by Kevin MacLeod
